body:
Your Agata drawings are beautiful. You're definitely one of the best manga artists. My favorite stories are Ofuro de Yaritai Houdai and Steamy Bathhouse. I think you must do Ofuro de Yaritai Houdai 2. Only Wataru and Shino characters should be included in the story, and Wataru's constant desire to have sex should eventually break the shino and force him to escape from the wataru. But Wataru won't stop relaxed :D
This is my perverse script: d Such a continuation scenario would be nice. Agata, if you are reading here, please consider this idea :)

You must do Ofuro de Yaritai Houdai 2, even if it's a different story.  I became a member here because I had to write you this message :D I need your beautiful drawings. Please draw new ones :)
